func_sig.description: Calculate the probability based on favorable outcomes and total outcomes.
func_sig.name: calculate_probability

output_fraction.description: Indicate whether the output should be in fractional form.

func_sig.description: Calculate the division of a number by the result of another expression and multiply by a third number.
func_sig.name: calculate_division_expression

expression.description: An expression to evaluate for the denominator.

multiplier.description: A number to multiply the result by.
